>>>>>>> e534095eca857fbf243cfc9fab0a9dded46680e4 Main Node Name : SMB (Server Message Block)
Subnodes and Content:
1. Description
• ◇ Protocol : SMB (Server Message Block) • ◇ Function : Protocol primarily used on Windows networks for sharing files, printers, and other resources between devices on the same network. It is an application-layer protocol that facilitates data transfer and interaction between devices.
• Ports
◇ ◇ 445 : Default port for direct SMB communication. ◇ ◇ 137-139 : Used for NetBIOS over TCP/IP, previously used in older SMB versions.
• Security
◇ ◇ Data Encryption : SMB by default does not encrypt data, but recent versions (e.g., SMBv3 ) support secure encryption and authentication. ◇ ◇ SMBv3 : Introduces AES encryption and other security improvements. ◇ ◇ Kerberos : Provides secure authentication in Active Directory environments. ◇ ◇ NTLM : Challenge-response-based authentication.
• Services
◇ ◇ Samba : Compatibility with SMB on Linux/Unix systems for integration with Windows networks. ◇ ◇ SMB (Windows native) : Built-in SMB service in Windows. ◇ ◇ CIFS (Common Internet File System) : An older version of SMB, still used in certain environments.
• Commands
◇ smbclient : Connect to an SMB sharebash
net view : View shared resources on a server
net use : Map a network drive
• Notes
• ◇ ADMIN$ : Administrative shares are hidden network shares on Windows that allow remote access to all disk volumes on a system connected to the network. These shares cannot be permanently deleted but can be disabled. • ◇ C$ : Administrative share for the C:\ disk volume, where the operating system is hosted. • ◇ IPC$ : Inter-process communication share used for inter-process communication through named pipes; not part of the file system. • ◇ WorkShares : Custom shares on the network.
• Vulnerabilities
◇ ◇ PsExec : Vulnerable service enabling remote command execution. ◇ ◇ enum4linux : Enumeration tool used to gather information about SMB shares.
• Nmap Scripts
◇ smb-vuln-ms17-010 : Script for checking the MS17-010 vulnerability.
• Metasploit Modules
◇ ms17_010_eternalblue : Exploit module for the EternalBlue vulnerability (MS17-010).
-Tools
nmblookup
smbclient
PsExec
enum4linux
rpcclient -U "" -N demo.ine.local
Questions What is the NetBIOS computer name of samba server? Using smbclient determine whether anonymous connection (null session) is allowed on the samba server or not. HOW? smbclient //server/share
net view \\server
net use X: \\server\share
